text: Ezɨ Josep uan ingangarir gumazibav gɨa ghaze, aveghbuaba vaghvagh, dabirabibar dapighirɨ. An ifongiam, aveghbuaba uan otɨrmɨrimɨn azenibar gɨn mangɨ dapighiram, otarir ivariamɨn ikegh mangɨ bar dozimɨn tugh. Ezɨ aveghbuaba iza uan dabirabir kabar apiagha gara, dɨgavir kuram gamigha pura uarir gari.
